title: Bengali butternut squash with chickpeas
description: This warming, quick and easy recipe is vegetarian comfort food at its best.
ingredients: ½ tsp panch phoran (a blend of equal quantities of fenugreek, nigella seeds, fennel seeds, cumin and mustard seeds), available from Asian supermarkets, also known as Bengali five-spice
2 tsp ginger paste (available from Asian supermarkets, or make your own by crushing or blending fresh ginger to a rough paste, adding water if necessary to loosen)
500g/1lb 2oz butternut squash, peeled, seeds removed, flesh cut into 4cm/1½in cubes
